headline: Personal Protective Equipment Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Honeywell, DuPont, and 3M Lead with Innovations Across Advanced Materials, Industrial Technologies, and Sustainability Solutions
summary: The Personal Protective Equipment Companies Quadrant offers an in-depth analysis of the global PPE market, detailing the top 12 industry leaders among over 112 companies evaluated. Key players include Ansell, Honeywell, 3M, DuPont, and MSA Safety. PPE is vital for protection against diverse hazards in high-risk industries and is driven by strict global safety regulations. Challenges such as supply chain issues and substandard products persist, while manufacturers focus on comfort and protection

headline: DuPont Water Solutions Wins BIG Sustainability Award for Advancements in Industrial Wastewater Reuse
summary: DuPont (NYSE:DD) today announced that its Water Solutions team has been recognized as a 2025 "Sustainability Squad" in the BIG Sustainability Awards for its work to advance industrial wastewater treatment, reuse and minimal liquid discharge (MLD).

headline: Polyimide Films & Tapes Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Kaneka, DuPont, and UBE Lead with Specialty Chemicals, Advanced Materials, and Next-Generation Technologies
summary: The new POLYIMIDE FILMS AND TAPES Companies Quadrant provides a comprehensive analysis of the global polyimide films and tapes market, detailing key players, technological advancements, and industry trends. Polyimide films, known for exceptional thermal stability and electrical insulation, are integral to the electronics industry, notably in flexible printed circuits used in modern devices.
